reviews.review: Buy it. There is DOSH

quality game, very very addictive.. :)
/hardon
The best game.

Killing floor is a zombie survival game, the basics for the game is that you go around and survive from attacking zombies. It's a really good game and is also heavy on coop gameplay so grab some friends! It's not an expensive game and has lots of hours gameplay. There are events on such as the Potato Sack, Summer Sideshow and more that have been on. The whole game seems to me like a arcade type of game and I'd rate it a 8/10 because of the fun events it has.
Probably the best coop survival game around.
Suivi exemplaire, gameplay simple mais accrocheur, Grand prix du jeu vidéo catégorie feeling des armes, défoulant à mort.
BUY THIS GAME FOR GAWDS SAKES 'ELP ME! I AM WELDIN' DIS DOAH! You're all fur coat and no knickers, bitches!
This is the Game where you Kick some Specimen Ass and Chew Bubble Gum, and your all out of Bubble Gum.

One of the best First-Person Shooter's available. Never mind Survival Shoot-Em-Ups. Simples.
The gameplay is sublime, the voice-overs are humorous [although tiresome after a while, maybe that could be a next addition Tripwire?], and you can nearly feel the punch and bite of the weapon's at higher levels.
The different classes allow for many, many different play styles, while also being quite challenging to level up. It also looks and sounds superb, especially for an engine that was made in 2003 with no major enhancements, it has aged really well [testament to Unreal's ability right there].
It is also continuously updated and supported through DLC packs, and seasonal “events”. The DLC is paid-for [character skin packs], while the events are completely free.
For €25 you'd be a fool to not entertain yourself with this

This game made me go to Britain on my vacation.
Don't be fooled though, the simulation in Killing Floor is much milder than the actual situation in England.
Wer Killing Floor uncut gespielt hat weiß warum ich es empfohlen hab^^
WELDIN' THIS DOAH! Play Killing Floor, make friends, kill floors.
This is the only game on steam that you need.
Zombie blasting fun. Quick and easy to get into, persistant rewards for playing that stay with you game to game. Very teamwork oriented.
great game
There is just no end to the dosh.
Best friggin zombie game ever!!!
Лучшая в своём жанре игра и уж даже L4D2 в подмётки не годится даже со своим движком+разработчики постоянно обновляют всякие веселья(ивенты)!
One of my fav games, like left for dead, but take out the missions and safe houses and add in harder to kill zombies
Be the victim of being welded into a room with no escape.
スルメゲー、いやスメゲー。
Like Left 4 Dead but better.
クラス制のホラーFPS。各職業の特性を生かして、迫り来るスペシメンと呼ばれるクリーチャーの襲撃から生き残ろう！ユーザー作成によるカスタムマップも大量にあり、また作成元もちょくちょくアップデートを行っているのでまだまだ遊べるゲームです。わるなばい！

The sheer definiton of Zombie Party! This game has the workings of some of the best arcade games and the star are the mutated monsters gnawing at your ankles! Stunning and smoothe graphics for an Indie Title. Though it has no story, the experience you have with your friends will MAKE the story you talk about the next day at school with them! Don't pass up an oppurtunity to be apart of hours of fun, wise English cracks and comments, and plenty of gorey goodness! 4.5 out of 5!
The best Harry Enfield simulator out there, worth all the dosh
This is a game for all you zombie lovers out there. I find this game very challenging but completely fun! great fun with your freinds online as well!

Six joueurs doivent s'allier bon gré mal gré pour survivre dans un Londres infesté de vilaines créatures. Si le concept fait penser immédiatement à Left 4 Dead c'est qu'en effet les deux jeux sont très proches. Il serait cependant dommage et injuste de ne voir chez l'un qu'un clone de l'autre tant les différences les éloignant sont nombreuses. Plus difficile, technique, exigeant et accrocheur que le jeu de Valve, le petit bijou de Tripwire Interactive se veut également moins fun et plus austère. 

Soutenu par un système de classes complémentaires, il peut se vanter de jouir d'une grosse durée de vie : entre un contenu vraiment riche (de nombreuses maps, officielles ou non, assurent une grande variété de lieux à découvrir) et un système d'XP ciblé, Killing Floor a tout pour vous occuper, vous et vos potes, des nuits durant. A quoi bon s'en priver ? Vous aurez beau fuir, ils vous retrouveront.

Story 11/10 - Kill waves of zombies on multiplayer maps.
Graphics 7/10 - Showing its age recently but the ZED time reload animation always gets me.
Gameplay 10/10 - FPS co-op zombie survival with guns, lots of guns.

Overall level of fun 10/10 - Great game to jump back and forth to during down times. wouldnt recommend going full wack on it though otherwise gets repatative.
Well, there's a reason I've logged more hours playing this than anything else so far.

You like Zombies?
You like leveling up your weapons and abilities?

GET IT!
やたらと熱い協力モード専用FPS。この熱さはFPSじゃないけどGOW2(ギアーズ２）のHordeモードやっているみたい。慣れるまで常時忙しいかもしれない。短時間でも敵を撃っておけばちょこっとづつキャラ育成できて楽しいので時間がない人にもいいかも◎
Bag O Shite

Killing Floor (Co-Op Survival Horror): teamwork, teamwork and more teamwork!  Did I forget to mention teamwork ? This game by Tripwire Interactive stresses the need to  field  a team of players that have acquired specific game skills/weapons ( beserker, commando, demolition, firebug, medic, sharpshooter, and support ) in order  to   collectively eliminate  all of the various zombies, from the mild mannered flesh eaters to the rocket/plasma shooting nutters. No one player/skill does it all. Player specific skills over time may be upgraded from level 1 through 6 if a positive number of game performance statistics are accumulated. The game levels are beginner, normal, hard, suicide and hell on earth, played on various maps.
At just over 300 game hours, I've only begun to scratch the surface of this amazing game. Players of CS, DOD,L4D and any other FPS  game types will enjoy the constantly changing/varied gameplay. Every game is different! At $20.00 this game is a bargain (watch for sales
awesome zombie action
Its super awesome

Well, I have started playing this the past couple of weeks, and all I can say is, wow, I am really surprised at how much content and fun this game is for it being a low budget/small development team title. It has great gameplay, replayability with the amount of levels and the leveling of your classes, and also the customized servers. The main problems I see are a few glitches here and there and not as many bosses or variety as there can be, but these are very minor problems. I highly recommend this title if you love co-op FPS games!

我很慶幸我沒有去買L4D2...因為它比L4D2還來的刺激、更需要合作...
Thanks God I didn't buy Left 4 Dead,because this game is AWESOME...
Great survival co-op game its really fun
Mindless fun and great developer support!  But don't play firebug or I will cry :*(
This is a frantically fun game. It's creepy, silly, awesome and tense. I really don't think you could go wrong if you like the screenshots.

Killing Floor is one of the best survival horror FPS's out there. Enemies comes in waves and grow in numbers and get harder each wave. Teamwork is essential to survival so stick together. At the end of each wave you get to buy stuff with the money you make from killing the creatures so you can't just let everyone else do the work. Achievements make this game playable many times as does the leveling up feature. Great game, highly reccommend. 10/10.
Fun Co-Operative FPS, gets really hard too.
Brilliant game.

A thrilling game of biological castle defense wherein your only hope for survival lies in the hands of you and your team mates. More strategic than Nazi Zombies and more team oriented that Left 4 Dead, Killing Floor manages to provide an endless amount of fun and challenge. A must have.

This is a MUST have for all the zombie game fans out there. Killingfloor has been around for quite some time, but the gameplay just doesn't seem to get old, with variety of classes, weapons(They feel just perfect), zombies and maps. The game may not have up to date graphic visuals, but it has been gradually refined, polished, through the years and it is my recommended zombie game that is still unheard of from many gamers who are fan of zombie genre. It is about $30 in steam, and it's well worth the price.

I forgot to mention this game's core is the multiplayer experience, and it's especially gold when it comes to playing with your mates. The extremely annoying weapon merchant, and the unique choice of accent for the chracters in the game is also a distinguished feature. I just can't help myself but to come back to this game time and time again.

I give 9/10 for this one. great game
I would really like to see some updates for some new weapons though, the old ones are getting a bit old.
One of the best Co-op surival games with an awesome soundtrack to boot!

Des expériences sur des humains loupées, des méchants pas beaux, quelques potes et c'est parti !!!
Un fps co-op fun et bourré d'adrénaline. Incroyablement bien optimisé, il tourne facilement sur des configs moyennes. Bref !!! 
Je le recommande vivement !!!
Considering how often this game goes on sale, it's definitely worth what you'll undoubtedly end up paying for it.

A great fragfest!!!
You need to stick with it to gain the skill it takes to stay alive because it doesn't play like any other fps. Worth the money.
Для тех кто любит страшные игры,в этой игре страшно все,старый движок придает графике еще более страшный вид 10 из 10 если вы хоите обосраться,6 из 10 если хотите тупо валить зомбашей

I'll be honest...This game is pretty bland... But! If you're looking for a mindless killing game... This one is great... I think it's pretty good for getting that "I must kill something, and I must do it now!" feeling out of your system... And don't think that the killing goes unrewarded... The more you kill... The more useful your weapons and other skills get (your playing skill and ingame stats). Very good co-op game. 6 player games seem like a good deal for gameplay...
PROPA GOOD GAME LAD, A LORRA LORRA FUN

Hmmm, what to say?  A great multiplayer co-op FPS game.  A co-op horror survival shooter essentially.  It's not as pretty as left for dead, but it's not too bad graphically really.  The gameplay is where it shines.  Lots of maps, lots of specimens, Specialty classes that you have to play differently.  Work together with your teammates or die.

Well, work together and die less frequently anyway.  The game is hard, but in a challenging/rewarding way.  I've spent a lot of hours in it, and I'm just starting to get decent at it.

Also, the first time you meet a raging Fleshpound in the dark is a, umm...bad thing.  Very bad thing.
Easily the most fun you can have with your pants on.

Play it. Are you playing it yet? No? Is it because this review is so awesome? Well, it isn't as awesome as playing this game. Don't believe me? I figured you didn't, since you're still reading. Let me break this down for you. Stop reading and PLAY THIS GAME! It's amazingly fun if you can get some friends to play with you.

The only downside is its limited single player play. The game loses a lot when played solo, and just isn't fun, in my opinion. Playing with people you know helps a lot too.
great game if your in to killing zombies blowing heads off or co-op zombie games

At first glance it looks like a mediocre zombie game right? Well guess again - that's what I thought first, maybe a downgraded version of L4D but I'll stop you there :).

The best analysys I can give you is like like playing Counter Strike Source but shooting zombies - However the fun doesn't end there. Its not constant killing zombies, there are 6 different class with each having their own pro's and cons so therefore you have to work as a team and with each kill you can increases the level of your class. Sweet eh?

The adrenaline rush when you have a shit load of zombies coming towards you and all your teammates are dead, can you survive?
All this for a measy $10? Yes. ^.^
L4D mixed with Call of Duty Zombies. But actually fun.
FARTS
Kill,Kill,Kill!

Que gran juego!!! Sin duda es el juego al que más horas le he dedicado.
Horas y horas de juego y parece que no acaba nunca, y cuando ya te conoces los mapas oficiales de arriba a bajo, puedes optar por jugar los de la comunidad.

Este juego es la misma mierda de siempre, nunca cambia, y la única forma de hacerlo es instalarle unos mod para que sea divertido pfff...  no tiene gracia para eso me lo descargo de internet pirateado y listo.

y el modo online o multiplayer es un asco por:
- Los pendejos q wuean.
- Los wnes de veinte y  siempre que se creen por tener unas kaga de sv arrendados!! 
- Los otros que se creen por ser wenos
- Muchos flaites.
- Otros por sus niveles altos
- Y por ultimo piensan que es vida o muerte no se lo toman como una diversión!!


Y que cambian en este juego pues: 
- Armas nuevas (Robo o inteligente? quien pagaría por unas armas de distinto color? valdrá la pena pagar por esa wuea? xD gente inocente o solo es para aparentar que tiene money?)
- Personajes (se paga por uno solo!! que chiste es este y un gran negocio lo admiro al wn q invento esto, un gran negocio y fácil de robar dinero a wnes :D)
- Mapas (gratis e incluye en las actualizaciones)
- Y los espectros o mostró como lo quieren llamar… :P (gratis incluyen en las actualizaciones)

Es divertido por un tiempo pero a la final aburre si quedaste pegado es por el sgte motivo, teni un Pc penca q con cuea te leen los demás juego y no te queda otra que jugar el kf o cs 1.6.

Evaluación del juego
4,5

SO MUCH FUN TO PLAY!
I'm not sure if this game is worth your money anymore, but I had lots of great times with it. If you ever go back to the past where it's still popular, buy it.
A old game, but still fun. Takes a while to level up all your perks so you will be keeped busy. Don't let those flesh pounds get you. :]. I would give it a 4/5.
A fun take on the classic squad based survival formula. Many different maps to explore and six different classes to level make this a game worth checking out.
Freaking awesome, best massacre game ever.
If your into killing babies... this isnt the game for you... BUT if you just cant stand elderly people... by all means... PLAY THIS GAME

This is without a doubt the best zombie shooter, as well as easily one of the best co-op games, ever. No questions asked. It never gets old. There are 7 classes to choose from, suiting anyone's weapon needs, a rewarding perk level up system which gains you experience on the game mechanics as you go along. You'll keep wanting to win every map over and over again as you go up in difficulties. Oh, and they threw in clever British voice acting to make it even more awesome.

This game will enlighten the pleasure centers of your brain
Badass first person shooter.
great coop game.

Originally I thought this to be one of those one-time thing for zombie killing but to my surprise, it has tremendous amount of playability that comes from player fan base.  Players can make their own mods and then share them with other players simular to how Mount and Blade series go, which is why it drawed me in.  I recommend this to anyone who is interested in FPS zombie/monster shooting that has access to variety of mods.
fun as hell!

for thos who love a good zombie based co op where you can have fun they now have a large set of set maps as well as a lot of custom made maps it also features a levleing system where the more you play a set class and use there wepons the cheaper it becomes and the more damage you do or heal points you can give etc

Great gameplay. Addictive and fun.
Way Underrated!

射撃の爽快感、敵の被弾時の豊富なリアクション、そこから生じるヒット感、MOD上がりの作品と侮るなかれFPSとしての基礎がこんなにもしっかりとしている。Hard以上の難易度での共闘感は特筆モノ。簡易なルールと溶接による籠城場所選択の自由度で、敷居も低い。これ以上のCOOP作がそうあるものだろうか！？ いやあるまい。
great easy game to play when your bored ^^
Hell yeah !
Le must des survivals horrors ! Même encore aujourd'hui ! ;)

It's worth full price so you'd be stupid not to buy this when it's on sale. An excellent class based FPS wave spawn survival game. You gain better profiency with class weapons as you level and there is a wide array of community maps and mutators to choose from as well. An excellent game when you want to plow through a horde of enemies.
Simple arcade-style zed-blasting goodness. Not so great with pubs, but an absolute treat with a group of bros.
